tours.title: Premium Desert Safari Dubai
tours.description: Experience the ultimate desert adventure with our Premium Desert Safari Dubai package. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, camel rides, and a luxurious camp experience with traditional entertainment and delicious food.
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable desert adventure with our Premium Desert Safari Dubai package. Experience the thrill of dune bashing in a 4x4 SUV, enjoy traditional entertainment, and indulge in a delicious buffet dinner under the stars.

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel/Location/Residence in Dubai
inclusions.vehicle: 4x4 SUV Land Cruisers for the Adventure Safari & Camp
inclusions.dune_bashing: 45 Minutes Dune Bashing by Safari License Professional Driver
inclusions.red_dunes: Dune Bashing at Lehbab Desert (Known as Red Dunes)
inclusions.camp_welcome: Traditional welcome at camp with Arabic Tea, Coffee
inclusions.food: International Buffet Dinner with Barbeque (Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian dishes)
inclusions.drinks: Refreshment with Unlimited Water, Tea, Coffee & Soft Drinks
inclusions.entertainment: Full Light and Sound display on stage and around the Camp
inclusions.belly_dance: Belly Dance Show on traditional Arabic music
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your Hotel/Location/Residence in Dubai

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: Outstanding premium desert safari experience! The dune bashing was thrilling and the camp was luxurious. The entertainment and food were excellent. Highly recommend for a special occasion!

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Great premium experience! The camel riding and sandboarding were fun activities. The buffet dinner was delicious and the belly dance show was entertaining. Worth the extra cost!

reviews.name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
reviews.comment: Exceptional premium desert safari! The professional driver made the dune bashing safe yet exciting. The camp facilities were top-notch and the traditional entertainment was authentic. Perfect experience!

tours.title: Private Evening Desert Safari Dubai
tours.description: Experience an exclusive private desert safari adventure with your group. Enjoy personalized service, thrilling dune bashing, and a luxurious camp experience with premium entertainment.
tours.description2: Indulge in a private desert safari experience with your group. Enjoy exclusive access to all activities, premium entertainment, and personalized service throughout your adventure.

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel/Home/Apartment/Residence anywhere in Dubai in a private Land Cruiser
inclusions.dune_bashing: Dune Bashing by Desert Safari License Professional Driver
inclusions.camp_welcome: Traditional welcome at camp with Arabic Tea, Coffee
inclusions.hubbly_bubbly: Hubbly Bubbly Smoking facility for your group
inclusions.food: International Buffet Dinner with BBQ (Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian dishes)
inclusions.entertainment: Full Light and Sound display on stage and around the Camp
inclusions.belly_dance: Two Live Belly Dance Show on traditional Arabic Music
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your Hotel/Residence in Dubai
inclusions.vehicle_capacity: There will be 6 People in one car
inclusions.driver_license: All our drivers are having License from U.A.E govt. for Safari
inclusions.vehicle_insurance: All our vehicles are fully insured and as per security requirements of UAE laws

reviews.name: Emma Thompson
reviews.comment: Perfect private desert safari experience! The personalized service was exceptional and the dune bashing was thrilling. The private camp setup was luxurious and intimate. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: David Wilson
reviews.comment: Outstanding private tour! The guide was knowledgeable and attentive to our group's needs. The desert activities were exciting and the dinner was delicious. Perfect for special occasions!

reviews.name: Lisa Rodriguez
reviews.comment: Great private desert safari! The exclusive experience was worth it. The camel riding and sandboarding were fun, and the entertainment was top-quality. Excellent service throughout!

tours.title: Safari with Bab AL Shams Dinner
tours.description: Experience a luxurious desert safari combined with an exquisite dinner at Bab Al Shams. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, stunning desert views, and premium entertainment in a unique setting.
tours.description2: Indulge in a premium desert experience with dinner at the iconic Bab Al Shams resort. Enjoy the perfect blend of adventure and luxury with dune bashing, entertainment, and gourmet dining.
tours.title2: Safari with Bab AL Shams Dinner

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel/Home/Apartment/Residence anywhere in Dubai
inclusions.dune_bashing: Dune Bashing by Desert Safari License Professional Driver
inclusions.welcome: Traditional welcome at Bab Al Shams
inclusions.food: International Buffet Dinner with BBQ (Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian dishes)
inclusions.entertainment: Full Light and Sound display on stage and around the Camp
inclusions.belly_dance: Two Live Belly Dance Show on traditional Arabic Music
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your Hotel/Residence in Dubai
inclusions.additional_info: This price is sharing basis price. We provide private vehicles as well
inclusions.vehicle_capacity: There will be 6 People in one car
inclusions.driver_license: All our drivers are having License from U.A.E govt. for Safari
inclusions.vehicle_insurance: All our vehicles are fully insured and as per security requirements of UAE laws

reviews.name: James Anderson
reviews.comment: Exceptional safari with Bab Al Shams dinner! The desert safari was thrilling and the dinner at Bab Al Shams was absolutely exquisite. The combination was perfect for a luxury experience!

reviews.name: Maria Garcia
reviews.comment: Outstanding luxury experience! The desert safari was exciting and the Bab Al Shams dinner was world-class. The service was impeccable and the setting was beautiful. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Robert Taylor
reviews.comment: Great combination tour! The desert safari was fun and the Bab Al Shams dinner was delicious. The luxury setting made it a memorable experience. Perfect for special occasions!

tours.title: Al Ain City Tour
tours.description: Explore the beautiful city of Al Ain, known as the Garden City of the UAE. Visit historical sites, natural wonders, and cultural landmarks on this comprehensive city tour.
tours.description2: Discover the rich heritage and natural beauty of Al Ain on this guided city tour. Visit iconic landmarks including Jebel Hafeet, Al Ain Oasis, and the historic Al Ain Fort.

inclusions.pickup: Pick-up & Drop-off from your Hotel / Residence

reviews.name: Jennifer Lee
reviews.comment: Interesting Al Ain city tour! The historical sites were fascinating and the guide was knowledgeable. The city has a different charm compared to Dubai. Great cultural experience!

reviews.name: Carlos Mendez
reviews.comment: Excellent Al Ain tour! The city is beautiful and the historical sites were impressive. The guide provided great insights into the local culture and history. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Anna Kowalski
reviews.comment: Great city tour! Al Ain offers a peaceful contrast to Dubai. The historical landmarks were interesting and the city's green spaces were beautiful. Good cultural experience!

tours.title: Helicopter Tour
tours.description: Experience Dubai's iconic landmarks from a breathtaking aerial perspective!
tours.description2: Soar above Dubai's most iconic landmarks in a thrilling helicopter tour! Experience breathtaking aerial views of the city's architectural marvels, including the stunning Atlantis The Palm Hotel, the luxurious Burj Al Arab, and the magnificent Burj Khalifa. Fly over the man-made wonders of The World and Palm Jumeirah islands, and take in the spectacular Dubai Marina skyline. This unforgettable experience offers a unique perspective of Dubai's most famous attractions from the sky!

inclusions.burj_al_arab: Burj Al Arab The 7 Star Hotel

reviews.name: Thomas Brown
reviews.comment: Incredible helicopter tour! The aerial views of Dubai's skyline were absolutely stunning. The pilot was professional and provided great commentary. A once-in-a-lifetime experience!

reviews.name: Sophie Martin
reviews.comment: Amazing experience! The helicopter ride was smooth and the views were breathtaking. Perfect for seeing Dubai's landmarks from above. Highly recommend for special occasions!

reviews.name: Ahmed Hassan
reviews.comment: Fantastic helicopter tour! The views of Burj Khalifa, Palm Jumeirah, and the city skyline were incredible. The pilot was experienced and made us feel safe throughout the flight.

tours.title: Hot Air Balloon
tours.description: Experience the magic of a sunrise hot air balloon ride over the Dubai desert!
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Hot Air Balloon experience! Soar above the Dubai desert for 45 to 60 minutes, witnessing a breathtaking sunrise over the desert conservation area. Before your flight, enjoy light refreshments to start your day. After landing, you'll receive a flight certificate to commemorate your experience. Available every day with convenient pick-up and drop-off service from anywhere in Dubai.

inclusions.flight_duration: 45 to 60 Minutes Flight Over The Dubai Desert
inclusions.certificate: Flight Certificate Will Be Provided After The Landing

availability.transportation: Pick-up & Drop-off Included from anywhere in Dubai

reviews.name: Jennifer Lee
reviews.comment: Magical hot air balloon experience! The sunrise over the desert was absolutely breathtaking. The pilot was skilled and the views were incredible. A truly unforgettable experience!

reviews.name: Carlos Mendez
reviews.comment: Amazing hot air balloon ride! The desert sunrise was spectacular and the peaceful flight was perfect. The crew was professional and made us feel safe throughout the journey.

reviews.name: Anna Kowalski
reviews.comment: Beautiful experience! The hot air balloon ride over the desert was peaceful and the sunrise views were stunning. Perfect for a romantic morning adventure in Dubai.
